sourcesContent:
export const spotifyButton = {
  background:
  'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #1DB954, #1ED760)',
boxShadow: '0px 0px 15px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
borderRadius: '50px',
fontWeight: 'bold',
padding: '15px 30px',
fontSize: '1000px',
transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
cursor: 'pointer',
outlineColor: '#1ED760',
  };

  export const appleButton = {
    borderRadius: '20px',

      
      backgroundColor: '#1DB954',
        color: '#FFFFFF',
        padding: '10px 20px',
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
        cursor: 'pointer',
  };
